## Menu.setUseNativeMenu() method

Force this menu to use native or DOM. (Only works on the desktop app)

**Signature:**

```typescript
setUseNativeMenu(useNativeMenu: boolean): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  useNativeMenu | boolean |  |

**Returns:**

this
